MAPPING.DESCRIPTION: Truncate, then load de-normalized exception information for claims with exceptions, for ALL Open periods.
MAPPING.NAME: m_TruncLoad_RCIT_OPN_EXCPT_DENORM

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This process de-normalizes RCIT_CLM_EXCPT into ONE row for claims WITH exception(s). The query uses VRCIT_MODEL_PRD_STUS to find ALL Open periods for selecting claims.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_RCIT_BASE_CLM_INV

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: The descriptions for these values are in VRAP.TVNDR_REBT_CD WHERE TYP_CD = 65.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: BTCH_STAT_CD

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: The descriptions for these values are in VRAP.TVNDR_REBT_CD WHERE TYP_CD = 85.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: CLM_SRC_CD

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: User Defined Join
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE:
-- join conditions
vrap.VRCIT_MODEL_PRD_STUS.MODEL_TYP_CD = vrap.RCIT_BASE_CLM_INV.MODEL_TYP_CD AND vrap.VRCIT_MODEL_PRD_STUS.MNTH_PERIOD_END_DT = vrap.RCIT_BASE_CLM_INV.INV_ELIG_DT AND vrap.RCIT_BASE_CLM_INV.CLM_GID = vrap.RCIT_CLM_EXCPT.CLM_GID AND vrap.RCIT_BASE_CLM_INV.BTCH_GID = vrap.RCIT_CLM_BTCH_CNTL.BTCH_GID

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Source Filter
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE:
-- filter conditions
vrap.VRCIT_MODEL_PRD_STUS.CLM_LOCK_CD IN ('O','A') AND vrap.VRCIT_MODEL_PRD_STUS.APC_STAT_CD IN ('O') AND vrap.RCIT_CLM_EXCPT.CUR_EXCPT_CD = '1'

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Summarizes claims into Exception Denorm format. Used by BOTH Open and Closed Period Denorms.
INSTANCE.NAME: mplt_Build_EXCPT_DENORM

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This process de-normalizes RCIT_CLM_EXCPT into ONE row for claims WITH exception(s). The query uses VRCIT_MODEL_PRD_STUS to find ALL Open periods for selecting claims.
INSTANCE.NAME: SQ_RCIT_BASE_CLM_INV

SHORTCUT.COMMENTS: Summarizes claims into Exception Denorm format. Used by BOTH Open and Closed Period Denorms.
SHORTCUT.NAME: mplt_Build_EXCPT_DENORM

WORKFLOW.DESCRIPTION: Build Open Exception Denorm data for ALL open periods.
WORKFLOW.NAME: wf_m_TruncLoad_RCIT_OPN_EXCPT_DENORM
